description: Valid movement patterns and muscles for exercise enrichment. LLM must map to these exact names.

muscles.description: Specific anatomical muscles (preferred over muscle groups)

muscle_groups.description: Use only when specific muscle not determinable

mapping_guidance.quads_or_quadriceps: Use 'Rectus Femoris' for general quad work, or specific vastus muscles if known
mapping_guidance.hamstrings: Use 'Biceps Femoris' for general hamstring work, or 'Semimembranosus'/'Semitendinosus' if medial
mapping_guidance.glutes: Use 'Gluteus Maximus' for hip extension, 'Gluteus Medius' for abduction/stability
mapping_guidance.abs: Use 'Rectus Abdominis' for flexion, 'External Obliques'/'Internal Obliques' for rotation, 'Transverse Abdominis' for stability
mapping_guidance.delts: Use 'Deltoid (Anterior)', 'Deltoid (Lateral)', or 'Deltoid (Posterior)' based on movement plane
mapping_guidance.forearms: Use 'Forearm Flexors' for grip, 'Forearm Extensors' for wrist extension

role_definitions.primary: Main movers - muscles doing the primary work of the exercise
role_definitions.secondary: Synergists and stabilizers - muscles assisting or stabilizing during the movement
